result.title: Introducing Code Blogs and Human Benchmark
result.content:
Hi there, I am starting to get serious about competitive programming and I am constantly trying to solve harder problems and progress further on my coding and problem solving journey, However I am doing things a bit differently here, I am starting Code Blogs on my personal website and will post the solutions and hints to the problems I have solved to help beginners. Some of you may wonder that why am I doing this when the editorials exist, there are 2 things about the blog that would be different from the editorials.

  1. I would be providing progressive Hints so that someone who is stuck on the problem may get a helpful jump start.
  2. The explanation I would be writing would be more comprehensive and easier to understand.

This post is a good example of what I would be doing.

I would also like to introduce to you another project of mine called Human Benchmark, a platform where some fellow coders and non-coders would take different challenges like 28 hours days, Drinking certain beverages, etc and try to boost our productivity and mental capability to the fullest.

If anyone would like to help for the Blog or for the Benchmarks please let me know in the comments or PM me.

I hope you like my initiatives.

Have a great day ahead!
